mapper.insert: insert into orderform(order_id, user_id, money, address, phone, receiver, createtime) values (#{order_id}, #{user_id}, #{money}, #{address}, #{phone}, #{receiver}, now())
mapper.select: select id, order_id, user_id, money, address, phone, receiver, state, createtime, paymenttime, sendtime, finishtime, isdel from orderform where id = #{id}
select id, order_id, user_id, money, address, phone, receiver, state, createtime, paymenttime, sendtime, finishtime, isdel from orderform where user_id = #{user_id}

select id, order_id, user_id, money, address, phone, receiver, state, createtime, paymenttime, sendtime, finishtime, isdel from orderform
limit #{pageInfo.start},#{pageInfo.limit}
select o.id,order_id,o.product_id,o.count,o.price,p.name from orderformdir o join product p on o.product_id=p.product_id where o.order_id=#{o.order_id}
